casebody.data:
HUFFMAN v. MOORE COUNTY. No. COA06-758. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 19, 2007. Certification Date July 9, 2007.

Appeal from NC Industrial Commission (I.C. #480967, I.C. #500200, I.C. #564609, I.C. #481108, I.C. #481105, I.C. #924348, I.C. #521226, I.C. #509087).

Cases reported without published opinion. Remanded.
